title: Just lost connection to game
body: as did everyone else. Anyone one else just get "attempting to reconnect"? It is most certainly not my internet as my skype call and such was still going.

replies.body: Yeah i have had this a few times last couple days. in ranked AND aram.. kinda strange that riot isnt addressing it
Yeah it's happening to me too. Some people apparently not though. I thought I was the only one until I did some digging in the forums. Has to be some kind of bug on league/riots end.
Im in the same boat, just kept saying unable to connect to server. Was finally able to join 15 minutes in. Our 5th team member never connected. No loss prevention, no nothing.
yea, same while i was playing ranked. 4 of our teammates DCed, we thought the game will be prevented, so we just surrender but we still lost LP. such a bad game, we should get justice.
